text: (Rántí) Ọjọ́ tí (Allāhu) yóò kó gbogbo wọn jọ pátápátá, (Ó máa sọ pé): “Ẹ̀yin àwùjọ àlùjànnú, dájúdájú ẹ ti kó ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ènìyàn sọnù.” Àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ wọn nínú àwọn ènìyàn yóò wí pé: “Olúwa wa, apá kan wa gbádùn apá kan ni. A sì ti lo àsìkò wa tí O bù fún wa (láti lò).” (Allāhu) sọ pé: “Iná ni ibùgbé yín; olùṣegbére ni yín nínú rẹ̀ àfi ohun tí Allāhu bá fẹ́ . Dájúdájú Olúwa rẹ ni Ọlọ́gbọ́n, Onímọ̀
